SELECT UME_ROLE.ROLE_ID AS "roleId", UME_ROLE.ROLE_NAME AS "roleName", UME_RESOURCE.RES_ID AS "resId", UME_RESOURCE.RES_TYPE AS "resType", UME_RESOURCE.RES_NAME AS "resName", UME_RESOURCE.RES_GROUP AS "resGroup", UME_RESOURCE.RES_INDEX AS "resIndex", UME_RESOURCE.RES_LINK AS "resLink", UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_ID AS "accResId", UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_LEVEL AS "accLevel" FROM UME_ROLE_ACL LEFT JOIN UME_RESOURCE ON (UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_ID = UME_RESOURCE.RES_ID AND UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_TYPE = UME_RESOURCE.RES_TYPE) LEFT JOIN UME_ROLE ON UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID = UME_ROLE.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN UME_USER_ROLE ON UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID = UME_USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID WHERE (UME_RESOURCE.RES_STATUS IS NULL OR UME_RESOURCE.RES_STATUS = 1) AND UME_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #{param}
AND UME_ROLE.ROLE_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID, UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_TYPE, UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_ID

SELECT UME_RESOURCE.RES_ID AS "accResId", UME_RESOURCE.RES_ID AS "resId", UME_RESOURCE.RES_TYPE AS "resType", UME_RESOURCE.RES_NAME AS "resName", UME_RESOURCE.RES_GROUP AS "resGroup", UME_RESOURCE.RES_INDEX AS "resIndex", UME_RESOURCE.RES_LINK AS "resLink" FROM UME_RESOURCE WHERE (UME_RESOURCE.RES_STATUS IS NULL OR UME_RESOURCE.RES_STATUS = 1) AND UME_RESOURCE.RES_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{param}, '%') ORDER BY UME_RESOURCE.RES_GROUP, UME_RESOURCE.RES_INDEX

SELECT UME_ROLE.ROLE_NAME AS "roleName", UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID AS "roleId", UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_LEVEL AS "accLevel" FROM UME_ROLE_ACL LEFT JOIN UME_USER_ROLE ON UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID = UME_USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN UME_ROLE ON UME_ROLE_ACL.ROLE_ID = UME_ROLE.ROLE_ID WHERE UME_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #{param} AND UME_ROLE_ACL.ACC_RES_ID = '*'
